price: هغوى وويل: اې زموږ پلاره زموږ د ګناهونو بخښنه راته وغواړه بې شكه موږ خطا كاران وو.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
